Chatroom.kaomoji.doesNotExist.tips: This kaomoji emoticon package does not exist, please re-enter or enter |help to view parameters

Command.desc.mainCommand: Display related commands of [Xiaosu's activity module].
Command.desc.help: Display related commands of [Xiaosu's activity module].
Command.desc.export: Export the chat history of the current chat room. Enter: â€˜/xsa export -hâ€™ to show how to use the export command.
Command.desc.v: Display version information of [Xiaosu's activity module].
Command.desc.new: Show the latest update log of [Xiaosu's activity module].
Command.desc.act: Display a list of all actions added by [Xiaosu's Activity Module].
Command.desc.jieba: Show command help for automatic stuttering effect.
Command.desc.kaomoji: Show instructions for using Quick Kaomoji.
Command.desc.chess: Start a chess game! Who will play? (Enter /xsa chess -h to see help)
Command.help.export:
Enter: '/xsa export -[time]' to export chat records within the specified time range.
For example: '/xsa export -05:34-20:40' (can include seconds)
The current chat room is exported by default All chat history.
Attention!
Command.help.jieba: Input: `spacespace Words at the beginning will be pronounced as a stutter. Stuttering takes effect position There are two ways: If you type two spaces, a stuttering effect will be produced at the space position. If you type one space, word segmentation will be used. The system performs a stuttering effect. This command has an optional parameter: If it starts with `[1-9], The number represents the degree of stuttering, the default is 3, the higher it is, the more stuttering it will be. Example without stuttering degree parameter: ` [If you want to say] The effect after processing is It may be: 'If you want to say... - of -...' => Pay attention to the position of the space. Command method with parameters: `3 [What to say ] The 3 here is the stuttering level, which means that the segment with a space in each sentence will have a 30% probability of stuttering. The above words mean that a level 3 stuttering effect has occurred. If there is Two spaces: ` [What to say] ðŸ’¡In addition: If the number is followed by m, it will be stuttered according to the current level of excitement Add a moaning effect.
Command.help.kaomoji: Enter |+parameters, or click the small button below the chat room input field to display the kaomoji panel. Left click on the emoticon: Insert the emoticon into the current cursor position of the input field; Right click on the emoticon: Send the emoticon directly as an **star message; Middle click on the emoticon: Send the emoticon as a normal message . The current parameters are: help displays the functions of all parameters. allShow all emoticons. hp displays the happy emoticon pack sd displays the sad emoticon pack. syShow shy emoticon pack. arDisplays angry emoji text pack. spShows the surprised emoji text pack. cfDisplays confusing emoji text pack. ntShows naughty and funny emoticons.
Command.help.chess:
Use /xsa chess to start a chess game so that other players cannot see the board. 
When you select a square and click the send button, other players will see the game situation. 
Any player in other chat rooms can click on a grid. When any player clicks the send button, the game starts. At this time, other players who are not in the player's game will no longer be able to interact with the game sent by the second player. 
But when the first player sends (the initiator), other players can also join. In other words, the sender can play against multiple players at the same time. 
Players can modify their own placed chess pieces before sending, but they cannot modify the opponent's chess pieces. (You can modify all your chess pieces, but donâ€™t cheat in normal games~)
This plug-in does not provide victory or defeat judgment for backgammon or go. 
The capturing function of Go requires the capturing party to manually delete it from the board. 

After the player clicks the send button, the board will automatically disappear after 30 seconds. 
But other players can still see the board. Other players can only see the initial chess game, and ongoing chess games can only see the current game situation. 

Currently, it can only be played and displayed if you have this plug-in at the same time.

Data.TIPS_FOR_LOADING_OLDER_VERSIONS:
Xiaosu's action expansion:
 You have loaded an older version. 
There must be something wrong somewhere. 
This usually won't happen if you load the Mod through normal channels.
